sections.title: Purpose
sections.instructions: What does your project hope to achieve? Why does it exist?

sections.title: Stakeholders
sections.instructions: Who are your member owners, those with long-term interests?

sections.title: Benefits
sections.instructions: What benefits do your member-owners get?

sections.title: Responsibilities
sections.instructions: What financial and non-financial (e.g., labor) inputs are required for member-owners?

sections.title: Governance Rights
sections.instructions: Which key decisions are made, through which process, and by which stakeholders?

sections.title: Financial Rights
sections.instructions: What determines if/how you distribute surplus profits (dividends) to member-owners?

sections.title: Guidance
sections.instructions: Who are your advisors, and which stakeholder groups do they represent? If you have a board of directors, how many board seats go to each stakeholder group?

sections.title: Investment
sections.instructions: How much money do you need to be viable over the next year? How much can you raise from member-owners vs. other sources?
